Description of incident: Unusual activity was noticed on Sailboat Owner's web servers on the morning of February 23.  The website was immediately shut down, but sensitive information may have been accessed. Malware had been uploaded to the web server on the morning of February 22.  A total of 2,258 unencrypted credit card records were on the server and dated from 2007 until the day of the incident.  CVV codes and expiration dates were also exposed.
